tests.name: TC 0: Empty case
tests.run: ./tokki.sh ./GradingResources/cs105/00_empty.test.txt && python3 ./GradingResources/cs105/tokki.pyc ./GradingResources/cs105/00_empty.test.txt > out.inst.txt && diff -iw out.txt out.inst.txt && rm out.inst.txt

tests.name: TC 1: Single integer literal
tests.run: ./tokki.sh ./GradingResources/cs105/01_singleint.test.txt && python3 ./GradingResources/cs105/tokki.pyc ./GradingResources/cs105/01_singleint.test.txt > out.inst.txt && diff -iw out.txt out.inst.txt && rm out.inst.txt

tests.name: TC 2: Sample given in the book
tests.run: ./tokki.sh ./GradingResources/cs105/02_sample.test.txt && python3 ./GradingResources/cs105/tokki.pyc ./GradingResources/cs105/02_sample.test.txt > out.inst.txt && diff -iw out.txt out.inst.txt && rm out.inst.txt

tests.name: TC 3: Medium length sentence
tests.run: ./tokki.sh ./GradingResources/cs105/03_medium.test.txt && python3 ./GradingResources/cs105/tokki.pyc ./GradingResources/cs105/03_medium.test.txt > out.inst.txt && diff -iw out.txt out.inst.txt && rm out.inst.txt

tests.name: TC 4: Extra long sentence
tests.run: ./tokki.sh ./GradingResources/cs105/04_xlarge.test.txt && python3 ./GradingResources/cs105/tokki.pyc ./GradingResources/cs105/04_xlarge.test.txt > out.inst.txt && diff -iw out.txt out.inst.txt && rm out.inst.txt

tests.name: TC 5: "Invalid" sentence
tests.run: ./tokki.sh ./GradingResources/cs105/05_invalid.test.txt && python3 ./GradingResources/cs105/tokki.pyc ./GradingResources/cs105/05_invalid.test.txt > out.inst.txt && diff -iw out.txt out.inst.txt && rm out.inst.txt
